name: CGPatternTiling
desc: Different methods for rendering a tiled pattern.

items.name: case noDistortion
items.desc: The pattern cell is not distorted when painted.The spacing between pattern cells may vary by as much as 1 devicepixel.

items.name: case constantSpacingMinimalDistortion
items.desc: Pattern cells are spaced consistently. Thepattern cell may be distorted by as much as 1 device pixel whenthe pattern is painted.

items.name: case constantSpacing
items.desc: Pattern cells are spaced consistently, as with CGPatternTiling.constantSpacingMinimalDistortion.The pattern cell may be distorted additionally to permit a moreefficient implementation.
